faq.subtitle: We answer the main questions that other mothers have had

faqs.question: For what age of baby is the method recommended?
faqs.answer: The Calm Mom method is effective for babies from 0 to 24 months. We have specific techniques adapted for each age group: newborns (0-3 months), babies (4-12 months), and toddlers (13-24 months). Each phase has its particularities and the guide addresses all of them in detail.

faqs.question: Does it really work with very active babies?
faqs.answer: Yes! We work especially with babies considered 'difficult' or high-demand. The guide includes specific techniques for hyperactive babies, those with colic, or who have difficulty relaxing. Many mothers have reported extraordinary success precisely with babies who seemed impossible to calm.

faqs.question: How will I receive the material?
faqs.answer: Immediately after payment confirmation, you will receive by email the link to download the complete guide in PDF. The material is available for unlimited access, and you can download it as many times as you want. We also send it via WhatsApp to ensure you receive it.

faqs.question: Can I access it on my phone?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! The guide has been optimized for reading on mobile, tablet, computer, or can be printed. We know that mothers need practicality, so you can consult the techniques anytime, anywhere, even during the night.

faqs.question: What if I want my money back?
faqs.answer: You have 7 calendar days from purchase to request a full refund, without any questions or justification. Just send an email to our support and we process the refund within 48 hours. It's that simple - your satisfaction is our priority.

faqs.question: Does the method work for twins?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have a special section dedicated to twins and multiples. We know it's an even greater challenge, so we've adapted the techniques for this specific reality. Many mothers of twins have already had success with our method.
